mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.product_id AS "product.id", a.no AS "no", a.site_id AS "site.id", a.file_url AS "fileurl", a.version AS "version", a.pid AS "p.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", site.name AS "site.name"
LEFT JOIN base_site site ON site.id = a.site_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO base_route( create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, product_id, no, site_id, file_url, version, pid, remarks ) VALUES ( #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{product.id}, #{no}, #{site.id}, #{fileurl}, #{version}, #{p.id}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE base_route SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, product_id = #{product.id}, no = #{no}, site_id = #{site.id}, file_url = #{fileurl}, version = #{version}, pid = #{p.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
